meanings.definition: A device used to increase the size or volume of something.
meanings.sent1: The expanders in the machine helped make the room bigger.
meanings.sent2: She used the breast expanders to make her clothes fit better.
meanings.sent3: The expanders in the cake batter made it rise like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like expanders, stretching our understanding of the topic.
meanings.sent5: The expanders in the balloon made it grow larger and larger.

meanings.definition: A substance that causes expansion or enlargement.
meanings.sent1: The expanders in the foam made it expand rapidly.
meanings.sent2: The hair product contained expanders that added volume to her hair.
meanings.sent3: The expanders in the paint made the walls seem to grow before our eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an expander, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The expanders in the dough made the bread rise beautifully.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that expands or extends something.
meanings.sent1: She was the expander of their knowledge, always sharing new information.
meanings.sent2: The expanders in the team helped them reach their goals.
meanings.sent3: The expanders in the story made it longer and more interesting.
meanings.sent4: His kindness acted as an expander, spreading positivity wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The expanders in the project made it grow beyond their expectations.
